description: List all tags on a Timestream query resource.

parameters.name: ResourceARN
parameters.description: The Timestream resource with tags to be listed. This value is an Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The tags currently associated with the Timestream resource.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key of the tag. Tag keys are case sensitive.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the tag. Tag values are case sensitive and can be null.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A pagination token to resume pagination with a subsequent call to ListTagsForResourceResponse.
